bibl.title: "No Papyrus and No Portraits": Hogarth, Grenfell and the First Season in the Fayum, 1895-6.
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - Hogarth and Egyptology. - I. Kom Aushim (Karanis) 24 December 1895 - 4 January 1896. - II. Umm el-Atl (Bacchias) 5 January - 22 February 1896. - III. Kom Aushim (Karanis) 23-29 February 1896. - Appendix I: Hogarth's Letters to the Egypt Exploration Fund before and after the Excavation. - Appendix II: Hogarth's Article Dead Cities of the Fayûm (The Times, 7 April 1896).
bibl.seg: MONTSERRAT Dominic, "No Papyrus and No Portraits": Hogarth, Grenfell and the First Season in the Fayum, 1895-6.

[Introduction.] - Hogarth and Egyptology. - I. Kom Aushim (Karanis) 24 December 1895 - 4 January 1896. - II. Umm el-Atl (Bacchias) 5 January - 22 February 1896. - III. Kom Aushim (Karanis) 23-29 February 1896. - Appendix I: Hogarth's Letters to the Egypt Exploration Fund before and after the Excavation. - Appendix II: Hogarth's Article Dead Cities of the Fayûm (The Times, 7 April 1896).
